item.title: Damaged tree outside no. 65, 22nd September
item.description:

item.title: Footpath has become overgrown by invading vegetation, 22nd September
item.description:
This concrete footpath runs from the pavillion in Eynesford recreation ground to the woods. In many places the path has vegetation encroaching on it, you can not see the edge and low growing shrubs and trees overhanging. This path is narrow anyway and is not being maintained properly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ember Close, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned lime bike, 22nd September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Boss Street, Bermondsey, London
